EmailTemplate.name: Guangzhou Youth Basketball League
EmailTemplate.subject: Guangzhou Youth Basketball League
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The British School of Guangzhou Part of The British Schools Foundation
<?xml:namespace prefix = o />Dear Parents,
Our friends from the volunteer run and popular Guangzhou Youth Basketball League (GYBL) would like you to be aware that registration for this year's competition will be held next Saturday, 30th November at Utahloy International School from 9am to 12noon.
If you would like to register, please CLICK HERE for further details and HERE for a registration form.
Best wishes,
Administration Team
The British School of Guangzhou
World Class Education
_____________________________________________________
A Nord Anglia Education School - University of Cambridge Examination Centre - Member of The Federation of British International Schools In Asia (FOBISIA)- Member of the Council of British International Schools (COBIS) - Member of the Council of International Schools (CIS) - Licensed by the Chinese Ministry of Education
